articles.author: Frank Landymore
articles.title: Epic Shots Show Derelict Satellite Hurtling To Its Doom - Futurism
articles.description: The European Space Agency's ERS-2 satellite, after almost three decades in orbit, finally met its end this week.
articles.content:
Hell of a retirement.
Fiery Demise
After almost three decades in orbit, a large satellite called ERS-2 came barreling back down to Earth on Wednesday, finally meeting its end by burning up in our a… [+2166 chars]
